name: Perfectus Technology Inc
tag_list: verification-ip, pci-express-3-0, usb-3-0, usb-2-0, ethernet, spi, amba-ahb, apb, -axi, smbus, ocp, sas, sata, onfi-and-fibre-channel-
overview:
Perfectus is empowering the chip design industry by providing verification IP solutions for high-speed serial communications. Perfectus products accelerate the chip design & verification cycle with higher reliability and lower risk and cost.

Perfectus verification IP portfolio includes many standard protocol products like..PCI-express 3.0, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, Ethernet, SPI, AMBA (AHB, APB, & AXI), SMBus, OCP, SAS, SATA, ONFI and Fibre Channel. Specialties

Verification IP solutions- USB 3.0/2.0, PCie 3/2/1, ONFI, SATA, SAS, Fiber chanel, AMBA 3.0-AXI, APB, AHB, SMbus, Ethernet, OCP
